formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: The calculation utilizes the hypersonic flow equations: Pressure Ratio: \( \frac{p}{p_0} = \text{function of Mach number} \) Temperature Ratio: \( \frac{T}{T_0} = \text{function of Mach number} \)
